original: @363b * // 'phrul gyi me long dgu sgor zhes bya ba'i rtsa 'grel bzhugs//
analyzed: @363b * // 'phrul gyi me long dgu sgor zhes bya ba'i rtsa 'grel bzhugs//
translated: The Root Text and Commentary of the Magical Mirror of the Nine Gates

original: # // kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One!

original: rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg log rtog byang (1) chub yul snang ba'i //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg log rtog byang (1) chub yul snang ba'i //
translated: The general commentary on the view of yoga, the guide to the pure land of enlightenment,

original: chos kun (2) sems su gcig mi gcig / lhun (3) gyis grub pa gang la bgyi //
analyzed: chos kun (2) sems su gcig mi gcig / lhun (3) gyis grub pa gang la bgyi //
translated: Ascertains whether all phenomena are one in mind or not,üîΩAnd what is meant by spontaneous presence.

original: de nyid snang ba(4) yod dam med //
analyzed: de nyid snang ba(4) yod dam med //
translated: Is suchness existent or nonexistent?

original: ye nas sangs (5) rgyas yin nam min //
analyzed: ye nas sangs (5) rgyas yin nam min //
translated: Is it primordially enlightened or not?

original: khams(6) gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul //
analyzed: khams(6) gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul //
translated: How do sentient beings of the three realms wander in delusion?

original: 'khrul (7) pa nyid ni don ci lags //
analyzed: 'khrul (7) pa nyid ni don ci lags //
translated: What is the meaning of delusion itself?

original: rnal 'byor lta (8) ba'i ngo bo gang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lta (8) ba'i ngo bo gang //
translated: What is the essence of the view of yoga?

original: de dag (9) dogs pa'i the tshom gang //
analyzed: de dag (9) dogs pa'i the tshom gang //
translated: What are the doubts about those?

original: de rnams khyad par ji ltar che //
analyzed: de rnams khyad par ji ltar che //
translated: How great is the difference between them?

original: 'phrul gyi me long dgu skor bzhin //
analyzed: 'phrul gyi me long dgu skor bzhin //
translated: Like the magical mirror of the nine gates,

original: gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston //
analyzed: gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston //
translated: It is explained by nine magical words that illuminate.

original: sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul ni //
analyzed: sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul ni //
translated: The two kinds of illusion are the domain

original: sems kyi chos nyid ngang du gcig / de yi de nyid ji lta ba //
analyzed: sems kyi chos nyid ngang du gcig / de yi de nyid ji lta ba //
translated: Of the single nature of mind. What is its suchness?

original: mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du //
analyzed: mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du //
translated: Like the sky and the appearance of a rainbow,

original: log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang //
analyzed: log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang //
translated: Although the mind-streams of mistaken thoughts are different,

original: rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka' //
analyzed: rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka' //
translated: Because there is no family lineage, it is difficult to distinguish them.

original: sems nyid nor bu rin po che //
analyzed: sems nyid nor bu rin po che //
translated: The mind itself is a precious jewel.

original: ji ltar dmigs shing sems par snang //
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs shing sems par snang //
translated: It appears as it is imagined and thought.

original: 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis su 'char //
analyzed: 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis su 'char //
translated: Two mind-streams arise in sentient beings.

original: de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi //
analyzed: de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi //
translated: That is the basis of all non-entities.

original: log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun //
analyzed: log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun //
translated: All appearances of the objects of the darkness of mistaken thoughts

original: sems phyir mtha' la rtsod pa med //
analyzed: sems phyir mtha' la rtsod pa med //
translated: Are beyond dispute in the end because of the mind.

original: gang la yod med med pa lta //
analyzed: gang la yod med med pa lta //
translated: Look at what does not exist in what exists and what does not exist!

original: rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das //
analyzed: rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das //
translated: It is beyond the objects of thought and speech.

original: de ni de phyir rgyal 'gro zhes //
analyzed: de ni de phyir rgyal 'gro zhes //
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúthe movement of the victors.‚Äù

original: ris su bcad pa med pa la //
analyzed: ris su bcad pa med pa la //
translated: In what is not divided into parts,

original: gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin //
analyzed: gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin //
translated: Like a single entity, pure and impure,

original: phyogs su bltas na nor ba'i blo //
analyzed: phyogs su bltas na nor ba'i blo //
translated: If one looks in a biased way, the mind is mistaken.

original: ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul ba'i sems //
analyzed: ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul ba'i sems //
translated: However much the deluded mind of the world

original: me long g-ya' dang mkha' sprin bzhin //
analyzed: me long g-ya' dang mkha' sprin bzhin //
translated: Is like a mirror with tarnish or clouds in the sky,

original: rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas //
analyzed: rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas //
translated: Because there is neither awareness nor non-awareness,

original: phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus su 'khrul //üîΩ'jig rten brtan @364a * //
analyzed: phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus su 'khrul // 'jig rten brtan @364a * //
translated: One is deluded at the time of the condition of one side.

original: g-yo la sogs pa //
analyzed: g-yo la sogs pa //
translated: The world, the animate and inanimate, and so on,

original: snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med //
analyzed: snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med //
translated: In appearance, there is no nature.

original: rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir //
analyzed: rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir //
translated: Because the self-originated appears without outer or inner,

original: de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med //
analyzed: de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med //
translated: at that time, the nature is not impaired.

original: 'jug pa'i rnam shes de lta bus //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam shes de lta bus //
translated: In that way, the consciousness that engages

original: shes rab thun mong spyan yin no //
analyzed: shes rab thun mong spyan yin no //
translated: is the common eye of wisdom.üîΩThe self-originated pristine consciousness is the lord of all assemblies;

original: rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag / shes rab can gyi mchog yin no //
analyzed: rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag / shes rab can gyi mchog yin no //
translated: it is the supreme of the wise.

original: rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir //
translated: Because the vajra mind is the supreme empowerment,

original: lta ba med phyir rang spyi chos //
analyzed: lta ba med phyir rang spyi chos //
translated: there is no view, and the phenomena of the self and the universal areüîΩindivisible.

original: dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba //
analyzed: dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba //
translated: Free from the assertions of biased views,

original: ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs //üîΩgsum gnyis gcig gis x spangs //
analyzed: ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs // gsum gnyis gcig gis x spangs //
translated: the unerring intrinsic characteristic is realized.üîΩThe first is the individual, the clear,üîΩand the former buddhas and sentient beings

original: dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang // snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dag / so so sems rgyud tha dad pa //
analyzed: dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang // snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dag / so so sems rgyud tha dad pa //
translated: have different mind streams.

original: gcig na bdun la snga rtogs skye//
analyzed: gcig na bdun la snga rtogs skye//
translated: If they are one, the former would be realized in the latter.

original: de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za //
analyzed: de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za //
translated: In the same way, the mind stream would end in eight.

original: tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'gal //
analyzed: tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'gal //
translated: If they are different, they would be contradicted by the seven.

original: de bas dgag dang sgrub med pas //
analyzed: de bas dgag dang sgrub med pas //
translated: Therefore, since there is neither negation nor affirmation,

original: gcig dang du ma med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma med pa'o //
translated: there is neither one nor many.

original: gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu //üîΩphyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag /
analyzed: gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu // phyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag /
translated: The first of the third are the nine faults of conceptuality.

original: skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis shes //
analyzed: skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis shes //
translated: The latter are the twelve things to be known as faults.

original: mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni //üîΩmi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas pa //
analyzed: mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni // mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas pa //
translated: The thoughts of the unwise and the wiseüîΩare the unwise and the very unwise.

original: shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'i //
analyzed: shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'i //
translated: The very unwise are the extremists.

original: mi mkhas yod med rtsod byed cing ;
analyzed: mi mkhas yod med rtsod byed cing ;
translated: The unwise argue about existence and nonexistence.

original: / dgag dang sgrub pa gang byed pa //
analyzed: / dgag dang sgrub pa gang byed pa //
translated: Whatever they negate or affirm

original: de de de la chags sdang skye //üîΩmkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni //
analyzed: de de de la chags sdang skye // mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni //
translated: causes attachment and aversion to arise.üîΩThe wise and the very wise

original: mkhas pa phal pa dgag sgrub can //
analyzed: mkhas pa phal pa dgag sgrub can //
translated: are the ordinary wise and those with affirmations and negations.

original: sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed //
translated: They rely on the meaning of affirmation.

original: byis pa'i gzung 'dzin dbang gyur pa'i //
analyzed: byis pa'i gzung 'dzin dbang gyur pa'i //
translated: Those who are controlled by the dualistic perceptions of childish people

original: ma nor lam dang bral ba yin //
analyzed: ma nor lam dang bral ba yin //
translated: are separated from the unerring path.

original: shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la //
analyzed: shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la //
translated: For all the very wise

original: sems phyir dgag dang sgrub pa med //
analyzed: sems phyir dgag dang sgrub pa med //
translated: there is no negation or affirmation because of the mind.

original: de dang rang rig rang snang phyir //
analyzed: de dang rang rig rang snang phyir //
translated: Because of that and because of self-awareness and self-appearance,

original: dgag sgrub bral la yid mi rton //
analyzed: dgag sgrub bral la yid mi rton //
translated: do not rely on freedom from affirmation and negation.

original: de phyir so so dgag sgrub can//
analyzed: de phyir so so dgag sgrub can//
translated: Therefore, each one has affirmations and negations

original: @364b sgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir //
analyzed: @364b sgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir //
translated: because of clinging to the position of affirmation.

original: de de med pa ga la mthong //
analyzed: de de med pa ga la mthong //
translated: How could it be seen as nonexistent?

original: de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin //
analyzed: de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin //
translated: Therefore, it is the seeing of one‚Äôs own projections.

original: de de skas gdang ji lta ba //
analyzed: de de skas gdang ji lta ba //
translated: Like a ladder with rungs,

original: khyad par grangs dang dor ba med //
analyzed: khyad par grangs dang dor ba med //
translated: there is no difference, number, or discarding.

original: cha yod dug la mi 'thung bzhin //
analyzed: cha yod dug la mi 'thung bzhin //
translated: Like not drinking poison that is partially present,

original: log lta gnyis su ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: log lta gnyis su ga la 'gyur //
translated: how could there be two wrong views?

original: gnyis po de ltar de nyid la //
analyzed: gnyis po de ltar de nyid la //
translated: In that suchness, how are the two

original: grub pa'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon //
analyzed: grub pa'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon //
translated: conventionally established?

original: ma grub grub na nges tshig med //
analyzed: ma grub grub na nges tshig med //
translated: If there is no establishment, there is no definition.

original: de ma grub na de bzhin no //
analyzed: de ma grub na de bzhin no //
translated: If that is not established, it is the same.

original: de bas srid dang mi srid kun //
analyzed: de bas srid dang mi srid kun //
translated: Therefore, all possibilities and impossibilities

original: lhun grub phyogs su grub pa med //
analyzed: lhun grub phyogs su grub pa med //
translated: are spontaneously present without being established.

original: bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis //
translated: The first four have six faults each,

original: de bzhin phyi ma rjes su mthun //
analyzed: de bzhin phyi ma rjes su mthun //
translated: and the latter two are similar.üîΩIf it is said that there is no duality,

original: gnyis med zhe na dus gsum la //
analyzed: gnyis med zhe na dus gsum la //
translated: the arising of the three times is also nondual.

original: 'byung zhes bya ba'ang gnyis med dang // sman nyid phan gnod bdag gnas ltar /
analyzed: 'byung zhes bya ba'ang gnyis med dang // sman nyid phan gnod bdag gnas ltar /
translated: Like medicine itself, which is beneficial or harmful depending on the situation,

original: ngo bo tha dad 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: ngo bo tha dad 'gyur ba med //
translated: the essence is undifferentiated and unchanging.

original: phyogs las logs pa'i tha dad med //üîΩlnga pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs las logs pa'i tha dad med // lnga pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i //
translated: There is no difference apart from the position.üîΩThe fifth is the third fault,

original: skyon ni gsum pa ji bzhin grangs //
analyzed: skyon ni gsum pa ji bzhin grangs //
translated: which is the same as the number of

original: mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i //
analyzed: mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i //
translated: The three optical illusions are like nonexistents.

original: chos yod bzhin pas rang sems la //
analyzed: chos yod bzhin pas rang sems la //
translated: The three existents are in one‚Äôs mind.

original: de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug / rang bzhin lhun grub dpag bsam bzhin //
analyzed: de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug / rang bzhin lhun grub dpag bsam bzhin //
translated: Although those are not real, the six causes and conditions are naturally perfect, like a wish-fulfilling tree.

original: so sor snang ba dus gsum du //
analyzed: so sor snang ba dus gsum du //
translated: The individual appearances are in the three times.

original: rgyun du 'khrul la lhun grub pas //
analyzed: rgyun du 'khrul la lhun grub pas //
translated: Since they are naturally perfect, they are always confused.

original: 'gro 'ong 'byung 'jug med snang bzhin //
analyzed: 'gro 'ong 'byung 'jug med snang bzhin //
translated: Like appearances without coming or going, arising or entering,

original: gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs //
analyzed: gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs //
translated: the basis is the same as existent, nonexistent, and inseparable.

original: drug pa de ltar de bden na //
analyzed: drug pa de ltar de bden na //
translated: The sixth is if that is true,

original: de la skyon du bya ba bdun //
analyzed: de la skyon du bya ba bdun //
translated: there are seven faults in that.

original: thams cad 'ching 'grol dbyer med la //
analyzed: thams cad 'ching 'grol dbyer med la //
translated: Since everything is inseparable from being bound and liberated,

original: gnyis mthong 'khrul bar blta ba 'khrul //
analyzed: gnyis mthong 'khrul bar blta ba 'khrul //
translated: seeing duality is a confused view.

original: de bas blang dang dor ba med //
analyzed: de bas blang dang dor ba med //
translated: Therefore, there is nothing to adopt or abandon.

original: bde sdug gnas su ris ma blta //
analyzed: bde sdug gnas su ris ma blta //
translated: Do not view happiness and suffering as having a basis.

original: bdun pa rang rig can yin na //
analyzed: bdun pa rang rig can yin na //
translated: The seventh is if one has reflexive awareness,

original: de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: ten faults will arise.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di //
translated: This pristine consciousness of suchness

original: mi lnga'i bdag po kun gyi sems //
analyzed: mi lnga'i bdag po kun gyi sems //
translated: is the mind of all lords of the five families.

original: rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba //
analyzed: rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba //
translated: The object of that is the mode and extent of being,

original: rang yul med @365a * //üîΩpar des gsal ba //
analyzed: rang yul med @365a * //üîΩpar des gsal ba //
translated: which is not an object of itself.

original: nam mkha' sprin mthongs 'od bzhin du //
analyzed: nam mkha' sprin mthongs 'od bzhin du //
translated: Like the light in the sky through a break in the clouds,

original: rab rib gang dag shes rab snang //
analyzed: rab rib gang dag shes rab snang //
translated: The vision of wisdom is obscured by cataracts.

original: brgyad pa des mthong sgrib pa'i grangs //
analyzed: brgyad pa des mthong sgrib pa'i grangs //
translated: The eighth is the enumeration of the obscurations seen by that.

original: brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas //
analyzed: brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas //
translated: The eighth is explained with the branches.

original: phyag rgya bzhi yi gzhir gyur pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi yi gzhir gyur pa //
translated: The basis of the four seals

original: nges par ngos zin bya bar bsnyad //
analyzed: nges par ngos zin bya bar bsnyad //
translated: Is said to be the recognition of the nature.

original: ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal //
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal //
translated: Ignorance itself is the clarity of wisdom.

original: the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan //
analyzed: the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan //
translated: Doubt itself is the eye of certainty.

original: log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lam //
analyzed: log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lam //
translated: Erroneous conception itself is the unmistaken path.

original: de la mi mthun shes dang bral //
analyzed: de la mi mthun shes dang bral //
translated: One is free from the knowledge that is discordant with that.

original: dgu pa 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i //
analyzed: dgu pa 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i //
translated: The ninth is the view of the transcendent and mundane

original: theg pa'i lta ba gral dgongs //
analyzed: theg pa'i lta ba gral dgongs //
translated: Vehicles, which is the intention of the ranks.üîΩAll the teachings, which are like a ladder with rungs,

original: skas gdang lta bur bstan pa dag / kun kyang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: skas gdang lta bur bstan pa dag / kun kyang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir //
translated: Are free from a self.

original: 'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te //
analyzed: 'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te //
translated: What need is there to mention the knowledge of the noble ones?

original: de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub //
analyzed: de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub //
translated: Those are the negations and proofs.üîΩThe distinctions of the stages of existence and nonexistence

original: rim pa yod med khyad par dang // ltos pas phye ba'i khyad par ni //
analyzed: rim pa yod med khyad par dang // ltos pas phye ba'i khyad par ni //
translated: And the distinctions of the divisions of dependence

original: bdag spong bdag med sgrub pa dang // gzugs spong phyi steng sgrub pa dang // don 'gog sems tsam sgrub pa dang // mtha' spong mtha' bral sgrub pa dang // dri spong dag pa sgrub pa dang // mtshan 'gog mtshan med sgrub pa dang // blang dor 'gog med sgrub pa dang //
analyzed: bdag spong bdag med sgrub pa dang // gzugs spong phyi steng sgrub pa dang // don 'gog sems tsam sgrub pa dang // mtha' spong mtha' bral sgrub pa dang // dri spong dag pa sgrub pa dang // mtshan 'gog mtshan med sgrub pa dang // blang dor 'gog med sgrub pa dang //
translated: Abandoning stains, establishing purity,üîΩRefuting characteristics, establishing the absence of characteristics,üîΩRefuting acceptance and rejection, establishing the absence of obstruction,üîΩAbandoning effort, establishing freedom from effort,

original: rtsol spong rtsol bral sgrub pa dang // de dag kun kyang yod med phyir //
analyzed: rtsol spong rtsol bral sgrub pa dang // de dag kun kyang yod med phyir //
translated: And since all of these are nonexistent,

original: dgag sgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o ;
analyzed: dgag sgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o ;
translated: One does not engage in refutation and proof.

original: / rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston //
analyzed: / rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston //
translated: The distinctions of the divisions are shown.

original: mthong ba dag dang ma dag pa'i //
analyzed: mthong ba dag dang ma dag pa'i //
translated: The pure and impure views

original: rim pas don gcig khyad par snang //
analyzed: rim pas don gcig khyad par snang //
translated: Appear as different aspects of the same object.

original: mthong ba dge ba'i kun mthong 'di //
analyzed: mthong ba dge ba'i kun mthong 'di //
translated: This view of virtue is seen by all.üîΩThe various views of the vehicles

original: sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang // ji snyed bsdom pa'i bya ba rnams //
analyzed: sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang // ji snyed bsdom pa'i bya ba rnams //
translated: And the various activities of gathering

original: spyang bar bya ba ma yin yang //
analyzed: spyang bar bya ba ma yin yang //
translated: Are not to be discarded.

original: ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal //
analyzed: ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal //
translated: They are clearly distinguished as unmixed and complete.

original: kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid //
analyzed: kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid //
translated: Like the knowledge of all, the stains of blurred vision

original: bstan pa'i me long mthong goms rang dag sar //
analyzed: bstan pa'i me long mthong goms rang dag sar //
translated: The mirror of the teachings, seen and familiar, is pure on its own ground.

original: 'gyur bas ma 'ongs don can @365b ched bgyis pa'i //
analyzed: 'gyur bas ma 'ongs don can @365b ched bgyis pa'i //
translated: Through the roots of virtue of this activity, which is done for the sake of future benefits,

original: dge rtsas bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro bar bsngo //
analyzed: dge rtsas bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro bar bsngo //
translated: I dedicate it to myself and to infinite beings.

original: 'phrul gyi me long dgu skor rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phrul gyi me long dgu skor rdzogs so /
translated: The Nine Cycles of Magical Illusion is complete.
